title: Drawn by My Magical Power....
detail_text: <:th_ch0106/>Hmm, so this is the specialty store that you come to often, Karin....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>It’s in a hard-to-find place, but it’s a store with good style, isn’t it<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>A specialty store, huh.... How Tokyo-like....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Hmm? Did you say something?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>N-, nope, It’s nothing! Anyway, why did you bring me here?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>There are some accessories here that you might like, Yoshiko-chan. I wouldn’t wear them myself, but I like the way you dress as a fashion statement. Ah, look, how about this hair accessory?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>....Hmm. This is.... not bad....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>They said that they source their accessories from flea markets in Europe. So that one might be an antique<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Flea markets.... Antique.... The tools of a forgotten witch might have been mixed in here.... Fufu, they must’ve been drawn by magical power!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>If you’re interested in them, then that might just be the case, Yoshiko-chan. Hey, try putting it on your hair. I think it’ll fit with the clothes you have today!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
